downloader.object

Class Task

  • java.lang.Object
    • downloader.object.Task
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable

    public class Task
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, java.io.Serializable
    Major class about downloading which describe the Task block. Function runs in individual thread. Implementing Serializable interface.
    Author:
    Moon
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Running in a single thread as a timer, value grows only if status of this task is downloading or preparing or merging.

      Sets error true.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Task

        public Task(java.lang.String url,
    java.lang.String fileName,
    java.lang.String filePath,
    int threadCount)
     throws java.io.IOException
        Constructor of task.
        Parameters:
        url - HTTP_URL of file from Internet
        fileName - File name user saves the file.
        filePath - File path user saves the file.
        threadCount - Thread count set by user (ranges :1~ 16).
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

    • Method Detail

      • isError

        public boolean isError()
        Tests whether error occurs.
        Returns:
        true when error occurs.

      • setError

        public void setError()
        Sets error true.

      • clearError

        public void clearError()
        Sets error false.

      • beginDownload

        public void beginDownload()
        Start Downloading which equals to set threads.

      • setThreads

        private void setThreads()
        Establishes threads according to thread count. And start all threads.

      • resumeDownload

        public void resumeDownload()
        Function used after a task is paused. Start all threads.

      • pause

        public void pause()
        Pause this task if task is not paused , else resume.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stop the task. Usually caused by unknown connection error. Also controlled by user.

      • restart

        public void restart()
        Restart the task , especially used on a stopped task. All unfinished data will be cleared.

      • clearData

        public void clearData()
        Clear all temporary files generated by previous threads. Then clear threads.

      • merge

        public void merge()
        Merge all temporary files. If user defines the count of threads as ONE, rename the .tmp files to the destination file directly. If not , establish InputStreams for each file and write all .tmp files to the destination file and delete all .tmp files after operation.

      • isReadyToMerge

        public boolean isReadyToMerge()
        Tests whether task is ready to merge which equals all threads are finished
        Returns:
        true if task is ready

      • getURL

        public java.net.URL getURL()
        Gets URL.
        Returns:
        URL

      • getFileName

        public java.lang.String getFileName()
        Gets file name which is taken from the tail of file path.
        Returns:
        file name.

      • getFilePath

        public java.lang.String getFilePath()
        Gets file path of the task.
        Returns:
        file path.

      • getFileSize

        public int getFileSize()
        Gets size of the task
        Returns:
        size of file

      • getFinishedSize

        public int getFinishedSize()
        Gets size of finished data
        Returns:
        finished size

      • getTimeUsed

        public int getTimeUsed()
        Gets time used for downloading
        Returns:
        time used

      • getCurrentStatus

        public int getCurrentStatus()
        Gets current status of this task
        Returns:
        current status

      • run

        public void run()
        Running in a single thread as a timer, value grows only if status of this task is downloading or preparing or merging.
